Uses of Class
org.identityconnectors.dbcommon.DatabaseConnection

  • Packages that use DatabaseConnection 
    Package Description
    org.identityconnectors.databasetable
    This is the core package for the connector.
    org.identityconnectors.dbcommon
    This is a generic bundle that contains many of the utilities needed for any sort of database connector, such as query builders, connection wrappers, and other SQL utilities.

    • Uses of DatabaseConnection in org.identityconnectors.databasetable

      Subclasses of DatabaseConnection in org.identityconnectors.databasetable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatabaseTableConnection
      Wraps JDBC connections extends the DatabaseConnection overriding the test method.

    • Uses of DatabaseConnection in org.identityconnectors.dbcommon

      Methods in org.identityconnectors.dbcommon with parameters of type DatabaseConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SQLUtil.closeQuietly(DatabaseConnection conn)
      Ignores any exception thrown by the Connection parameter when closed, it also checks for null.
      static void SQLUtil.rollbackQuietly(DatabaseConnection conn)
      Ignores any exception thrown by the DatabaseConnection parameter when closed, it also checks for null.
